entries.title: The Far Side comic 1 for July 05, 2024

summary.caption: “I’m coming! I’m coming! … Keep your skin on!”

The Far Side comic 3 for July 05, 2024

summary.caption: “Oh, the whole flower bed is still in shock. He was such a quiet butterfly—kept to himself mostly.”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 4 for July 05, 2024

summary.caption: “Well, hell no, I can’t tell Harriet! … First thing she’s gonna ask me is what was I doin’ checkin’ out a decoy!”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 5 for July 05, 2024

summary.caption:
“Take this handkerchief back to the lab, Stevens. I want some answers on which monster did this—Godzilla? Gargantua?
 Who, dammit!?”
